Chris Harley

Front End Developer | Creative Thinker

Hi, I'm Chris a U.S. Army veteran turned front end developer based in Atlanta, Ga. I love expressing myself through creativity and learning new things.

- About Me

Hello, I'm Chris a fullstack developer based in Atlanta, GA.

I enjoy learning and creating things that live on the internet. My goal is to build applications that look amazing and help people fix real world problems that they're having. I enjoy expressing myself through creativity/art and I have a passion for problem solving. I'm a U.S. Army veteran who strides himself in being able to pick up on things quickly, change focus on the goal instantly as needed, work well with a team, and am culturally diverse.

Here are some technologies I've been working with lately:

  • - JavaScript (ES6+)
  • - React
  • - Node.js
  • - HTML & (S)CSS
  • - MongoDB
  • - postgreSQL

- Latest Projects

Featured Project

Sphyn

This is a full stack application built with React for the client side and Node.js for the server side with a postgreSQL database. This platform allows us to sell 3d tour packages that real estate agents and home sellers can use to promote their listings. By displaying these high-quality images with Matterport technology Sphyn assists real estate agents and homeowners with demonstrating a homeâ€™s appeal to potential buyers. A user can create their own personal account, purchase services and present their showcase to potential buyers. This platform has a backend API that communicates with our database to display home data.
  • Express
  • React
  • postgreSQL
  • Node.js
  • Emotion

Featured Project

soundWav

This is a full stack application built in Node.js. This platform makes it convenient for recording studios and musicians. Instead of calling or going to the studio the musician can directly from a internet browser book studio time. This application lets the user pick a recording room, a date, and a time and book the session. The room availability is kept in a database and notifies the user if the room is not available. If it is it books the session with the studio and notifies the user that there session has been booked.
  • Express
  • EJS
  • postgreSQL
  • Node.js
  • SCSS

Featured Project

gitDrafts

This application allows users to search a location and view breweries in that location to include their contact information and website. This project was built with React and uses the Open Brewery DB API as well as the Google Maps API
  • React
  • Emotion
  • Google Maps API
  • OMDb API
